author: E.
Mathieson
title: Cathode charge distributions in multiwire chambers: 4. Empirical formula for small anode-cathode separation
journal: Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research Section A: Accelerators, Spectrometers, Detectors and Associated Equipment
Nucl. Instrum. Methods Phys. Res., Sect. A
abstract: Single parameter values for the Gatti empirical formula describing cathode charge distribution in a symmetrical MWPC are presented, graphically, for small values of anode-cathode separation.
